snippet.title: Puppet Master The Game  - Thief Game Mode Trailer (2022)
snippet.description:
#puppetmaster  #asymmetricalhorror  #puppetmasterthegame   #multiplayergames  #3v1  #2v4  #4v4  #coop  #freetoplay  #ftpgame  #steamfreegames   

PLAY TODAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757610/Puppet_Master_The_Game/

THIEF ( 3 vs 1 GAME MODE)

Ever wanted to flip the standard Asymmetrical Multiplayer Horror Game formula? Where 3 heinous Puppets stalk a lone Human survivor? As a Human you must steal Andre Toulon's secretes of reanimation and escape with your life. As the Puppets must protect your Master’s secret at all cost! Sneak up on your prey and unleash a pint-sized siege of terror!

FOLLOW US!
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/PuppetMasterTG
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Octobergames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/octobergamesstudio/
